title: Muslims find a modest place in the Turkish sun
text:
Muslims find a modest place in the Turkish sun 02:04
Turkey's $26 billiontourism industry has been battered by security fears andpolitical disputes in recent years but one corner of the market is quietly growing - beach holidays for conservative Muslims. Reuters' Emily Wither reports from Alanya. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Turkey's $26 billion tourism industry has been battered by security fears and political disputes in recent years but one corner of the market is quietly growing - beach holidays for conservative Muslims.
